Show:

ozpIwc.api.locks.Api Class

Uses
  • ozpIwc.util.PacketRouter
  • ozpIwc.util.Event
Extends ozpIwc.api.base.Api
Defined in: src\js\bus\api\locks\api.js:12
Module: ozpIwc.api.locks
Parent Module: ozpIwc.api

The Locks Api. Treats each node as an individual mutex, creating a queue to access/own the resource. Subclasses the ozpIwc.api.base.Api. Utilizes the ozpIwc.api.locks.Node which subclasses the ozpIwc.CommonApiValue.

Constructor

ozpIwc.api.locks.Api

Defined in src\js\bus\api\locks\api.js:12

Create the data that needs to be handed off to the new leader.

Intended to be overridden by subclasses

declareRoute

(
  • config
  • handler
  • handlerSelf
)
ozpIwc.util.PacketRouter

Inherited from ozpIwc.util.PacketRouter: src\js\common\packetRouter.js:46

Assigns a route to the Packet Router for the specific action. This route is taken by a packet if its resource matches the routes resource template, passes any assigned filters. Additionally, a packet may only take one route, if multiple possible routes are possible, the route which was declared earliest will handle the packet.

Parameters:

  • config Object
    • action String

      The action this route is defined to (ex. "get", "set", "list", ...)

    • resource String

      The serialized uri template definition pertaining to the route (ex. "/foo", "/{id:\d+}", "/{param1}/{param2}")

    • filters Array

      Any filters that better isolate the packet routing based on the context and packet properties

  • handler Function
    The resulting action to be taken should this route handle a packet.
  • handlerSelf Object
    The scope of the handler, the PacketRouter object holds the default scope if none is provided.

Returns:

ozpIwc.util.PacketRouter:

initializeData

(
  • deathScream
)
Promise

Inherited from ozpIwc.api.base.Api: src\js\bus\api\base\api.js:168

Called when the API has become the leader, but before it starts serving data. Receives the deathScream of the previous leader if available, otherwise undefined.

Intended to be overridden by subclasses

Subsclasses can override this to load data from the server.

Parameters:

  • deathScream Object

Returns:

Promise:

a promise that resolves when all data is loaded.

onClientDisconnect

(
  • address
)

Inherited from ozpIwc.api.base.Api: src\js\bus\api\base\api.js:859

A handler function called when a participant has disconnected from the bus. Each node in the API is checked to see if its lifespan was tied to said participant, and if the lifespan deems necessary, removes the node. Can be overridden by inherited APIs.

Parameters:

  • address String

onLock

()

Inherited from ozpIwc.api.base.Api: src\js\bus\api\base\api.js:404

A handler method for the API's acquisition of the mutex.

  • An api will initialize any state passed on from the last leader (received as a broadcasted deathscream).
  • If no initial state passed and backend connnectivity is configured, the backend will be reached for persistent state.
  • Handle any requests during the transition to being the active API.
  • Call the API's onStart method to handle any custom API init functionality.

  • packetContext Object
